data_description.name: A descriptive and unique name for this Shadow Control (SC) instance
data_description.target_cover_entity_id: Cover which should be handled by this Shadow Control (SC) instance

facade_settings.title: Facade configuration
facade_settings.description: Configure the details of the facade (or even the window), which should be handled by this SC instance

data_description.facade_azimuth: Azimuth of the facade in degrees in direction from the inside to the outside. Valid range: 0° to 359°
data_description.facade_offset_sun_in: Angle from which the facade in comparison to the given azimuth, will be illuminated. Valid range: -90° to 0°
data_description.facade_offset_sun_out: Angle up to which the facade in comparison to the given azimuth, will be illuminated. Valid range: 0° to 90°
data_description.facade_elevation_sun_min: Min elevation of the sun, from which the facade will be illuminated. Valid range: 0° to 90°
data_description.facade_elevation_sun_max: Max elevation of the sun, up to which the facade will be illuminated. Valid range: 0° to 90°
data_description.facade_slat_width: Width of shutter slats in mm.
data_description.facade_slat_distance: Distance between shutter slats in mm.
data_description.facade_slat_angle_offset: Shutter angle offset in %, which will be added to the computed angle in case a correction is required. Default: 0
data_description.facade_slat_min_angle: Min shadow slat angle. Slat position will be in the range of this value and 100%. Default: 0
data_description.facade_shutter_stepping_height: Stepping of height positioning in % to prevent small steps, which could not be positioned by the used shutter. Default: 5
data_description.facade_shutter_stepping_angle: Stepping of angle positioning in % to prevent small steps, which could not be positioned by the used shutter. Default: 5
data_description.facade_light_strip_width: Width of light strip on the floor.
data_description.facade_shutter_height: Overall height of window or door. Required to calculate light strip width from previous configuration option.
data_description.facade_neutral_pos_height: Height of shutter in neutral position.
data_description.facade_neutral_pos_angle: Angle of shutter in neutral position.
data_description.facade_movement_restriction_height: Restrict height positioning to prevent redundant shutter movements e. g. between shadow and dawn.
data_description.facade_movement_restriction_angle: Restrict angle positioning to prevent redundant shutter movements e. g. between shadow and dawn.

dynamic_inputs.description: Configure the dynamic inputs, which will be required to automate the given cover
